name: test_e2e_with_logs[076_SQLI_ERROR_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_010` |
| **Name** | MULTIPOINT geometry error injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND MULTIPOINT((SELECT * FROM(SELECT name_const(version(),1),name_const(version(),1))x)) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~68000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:09.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_010-1772192169608-hn1yk7 pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_010 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_010-1772192169608-hn1yk7 pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_010 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
11:36:09.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_010-1772192169608-hn1yk7 pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_010 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
